akn:subsection.akn:heading: Works of art; printed or published materials; other artifacts or objects; photographs, motion pictures, or tapes

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Works of art; printed or published materials; other artifacts or objects; photographs, motion pictures, or tapes The Council may make an indemnity agreement under this chapter with respect to— which are (A) of educational, cultural, historical, or scientific value, and (B) in the case of international exhibitions, certified by the Secretary of State or his designee as being in the national interest.
